WEATHER FORECAST FOR 12 MAY 2025
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 12 MAY 2025

S
howery condition is expected to be enhanced in the Southwestern part of the country up
to some extent from today (12) evening.

S
everal spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces
and in Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at several places in Central, Uva and Eastern provinces
after 1.00 p.m.

F
airly strong winds of about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Northern, North-
central, North-western and Southern provinces.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
